statements: UPDATE player_profiles SET player_score = 1000 WHERE player_id = 1;

UPDATE high_scores SET score=1000, level_completed=5 WHERE player_id=101;

UPDATE player_profiles SET player_name = 'Alice', level = 5 WHERE player_id = 1;

UPDATE player_profiles SET level = 5, experience = 1000 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE items SET quantity = 20 WHERE player_id = 3 AND item_name = 'Health Potion';
